title: How would I go about finding the 'flag' in this QR image(Capture the Flag)? [closed]
content:
Closed. This question needs details or clarity. It is not currently accepting answers.
                                
                            











Want to improve this question? Add details and clarify the problem by editing this post.


Closed 6 years ago.







                        Improve this question
                    




How do I find the flag in this QR image? After scanning the QR image, I obtain the following text which may be of help: N2QzNjYyMzQ2NDMzMzMzMzM3MzAzNDM0NjEzMzMyNjEzNjM2Mzk2NTY2MzQ2NDMwMzgzODMyMzQz
MzM4MzAzNTYyN2I2NzYxNmM2Ng==
What have you obtained as the flag and how? Thanking you all in advance.

comments.text: The == at the end is a strong hint at base64 encoding. Have you tried decoding it?
And what did you do to try to get it ?!
i used base64 decoding but suspected there was one more conversion to finding the flag
@soufiane :( it was easy enough i dont think you should have provided anything more than hint igorsk already gave him a hint
@blabb you're right :/ I think he found me in a good mood lol
